8001.「おお！ 聞いていかれますか。\n では お話ししましょう。:
Oh! You are going to listen? Then let me tell
you a story.

8002.「レンダーシアとは 世界の中心にあり\n その地域一帯を指す 地名です。:
Lendersia is the name of a region in the
center of the world.

8003.「周囲は 海に囲まれているため\n 徒歩で向かうことは できません。:
It is surrounded by the sea, so it is not
possible to go there on foot.

8004.「レンダーシアに行く方法は ひとつだけ。\n この港町が誇る グランドタイタス号:
There is only one way to get to Lendersia. The
only way to get there is to cross the sea on
the Grand Titus, the pride of this port city.

8005.「また レンダーシアには\n グランゼドーラという城が ありまして\n これは:
Also in Lendersia, there is a castle called
Gran Zedora Castle, which is rumored to be...

8006.「なんでも その王家の者は\n 特別な血筋を 受け継いでいるとのことです。\n:
I have heard that the royal family has a
special bloodline. I'd like to meet him.

8007.「あらん ずいぶん かわいい子ねん。\n あたしは スギムっていうの。\n 船舶:
Oh my, you are a very pretty girl. My name is
Sugimu. I'm in charge of the Ship Bureau.

8008.「え～と あなたの名前は\n ……そう <pc>っていうの。\n いつ 出港でき:
Well, your name is... well, your name is
<pc>. You want to know when you can
leave.

8009.「……大陸を包む 紫の霧が消えないのは\n ちょっと 気がかりだけど \n レン:
...I'm a little concerned that the purple fog that envelops the continent just won't go away, but the waters around Lendersia have
calmed down.

8010.「グランドタイタス号の修理さえ 終われば\n きっと また以前のように\n レン:
As soon as the Grand Titus is repaired, I am
sure we will be able to go back to Lendersia
as before.

8011.「夢と希望を乗せて レンダーシアに旅立つ時が\n グランドタイタス号の もっとも:
The Grand Titus is at its brightest when it sets sail for Lendersia, carrying with it our hopes and dreams. I can't wait to see that
scene again...

8012.「……うふ 今は みんなのために\n 修理を がんばってるところよ。\n 出港す:
I'm working hard on repairs for everyone right
now. Please look forward to the day when we
sail.
